title: Establishment and long-term expansion of adult hepatobiliary organoids co-cultured with liver endothelial cells
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Hyun-Soo Roh, Da-Eun Kim, Gahee Kim, Jongsu Kim, Dengxia Fan, Hong Sook Kim, Yong-Hee Kim, Jae-Hee Lee, Byung Gak Kim, Min-Ok Ryu, Hwan Soo Kim, Kwan-Hyuck Baek, Dong Ha Bhang
